definition: Helong county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards

sentences.english: Rabbit and refuses to obey, and race results ranked in the dragon's front.
sentences.chinese: 兔子又不服，和龙赛跑，结果排在了龙的前面。

sentences.english: There must be a way to get past the draconians without a fight.
sentences.chinese: 肯定有办法不用和龙人战斗而通过的。

sentences.english: Just like the dragon, the phoenix was considered as a symbol of power and dignity by ancient monarchs.
sentences.chinese: 凤和龙一样，被历代帝王当作是权力和尊严的象征。

sentences.english: The Dragon Ball Team escapes their prison to search for Pilaf and the Dragon Balls.
sentences.chinese: 寻找龙珠的队伍逃出了监狱，直奔皮拉夫和龙珠而去。

sentences.english: Research result is almost fit to the fact of regional geological hazard in Helong City.
sentences.chinese: 划分结果比较符合和龙市区域地质灾害发育实际情况。

sentences.english: Just capable the incitement of Feng feather and Long Qi once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，刚才经历了凤羽和龙琦的刺激。

sentences.english: The subsidence is one form of coal mine secondary of the geological calamity.
sentences.chinese: 和龙市地质灾害主要为泥石流，其次是崩滑灾害。

sentences.english: Both Allen and Rondo have been very inconsistent in the postseason.
sentences.chinese: 雷阿伦和龙多在季后赛的表现都不够稳定。

sentences.english: At this point, the fir and reaching longtzer rock shop for into the train back to Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 此时，杉木和龙泽到达盘石店准备换成火车返回青岛。

sentences.english: I often dream about unicorns and dragons.
sentences.chinese: 我常常梦见独角兽和龙。

sentences.english: Is not it like opening the doors of a cold war with the dragon country.
sentences.chinese: 这会不会打开了和龙国冷战的大门。

sentences.english: We use unicorn hairs, phoenix tail feathers, and the heartstrings of dragons.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用独角兽毛，凤凰尾羽毛，和龙的心弦。

sentences.english: Bryant and Fisher will dominate Allen and Rondo.
sentences.chinese: 科比和费舍尔将会压倒雷阿伦和龙多。

sentences.english: The children enjoyed listening to the story"George and the Dragon" .
sentences.chinese: 孩子们都很喜欢听”乔治和龙“的故事。

definition: Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
Yunlong district of Xuzhou city 徐州市[Xu2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu/Yunlong county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
